name: tm81
effect: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
flavor_text.platinum: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
